INSERT INTO Product ( prod_name, prod_description, prod_price, prod_stock_quantity, cate_id, seller_id, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES( #{prodName}, #{prodDescription}, #{prodPrice}, #{prodStockQuantity}, #{cateId} ,#{sellerId}, NOW(), NOW())

INSERT INTO ProductImage ( prod_id, pi_original_file_name, pi_stored_file_name, pi_stored_url, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{prodId}, #{piOriginalFileName}, #{piStoredFileName}, #{piStoredUrl}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_name, p.prod_price, i.pi_original_file_name FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductImage i ON p.prod_id = i.prod_id
SELECT p.prod_name, p.prod_price, i.pi_stored_url, u.user_name FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductImage i on p.prod_id = i.prod_id LEFT JOIN User u ON p.seller_id = u.user_id

SELECT p.prod_id, u.user_name, i.pi_stored_url, p.prod_name, p.prod_description, p.prod_price, p.prod_stock_quantity, u.user_nickname, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductImage i on p.prod_id = i.prod_id LEFT JOIN User u ON p.seller_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_T C ON p.cate_id = C.CATEGORY_ID WHERE p.prod_id = #{prodId};

SELECT p.prod_id, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, p.prod_description , p.prod_stock_quantity, p.modified_at , i.image_id, i.pi_stored_url, i.pi_original_file_name, i.pi_stored_file_name FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductImage i ON p.prod_id = i.prod_id WHERE p.prod_id = #{prodId};
mapper.update: UPDATE Product p SET p.prod_name = #{prodName}, p.prod_price = #{prodPrice}, p.prod_description = #{prodDescription}, p.prod_stock_quantity = #{prodStockQuantity}, p.cate_id = #{cateId} WHERE p.prod_id = #{prodId};
